column6: MONSTER MADNESS!The Legion of Monsters have uncovered the rampaging, blood-thirsty source of evil plaguing them and humankind...but are they too late to stop it! And as they succumb to their killer instincts, will monster-hunter Elsa Bloodstone be forced to realize there's only one way to deal with the evil undead?! BY BLASTING IT BACK TO HELL WHENCE IT CAME?!
column7: | Elsa Bloodstone | Living Mummy | Morbius | Werewolf By Night
column8: | artist:Juan Doe | letterer:Dave Lanphear | colorist:Wil Quintana
